long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Space Bubbles
This is a fun HTML5 bubble burst game with 70 unique levels!


Play the classic and most addictive bubble pop game for FREE, match 3 colors and clear levels. Don’t miss out on this fun relaxing game! In this good old version, you need to aim & shoot, to drop & burst all bubbles. Train your brain with this original puzzle as you blast balls online or offline - anytime! Bubble Shooter ™ is the most exciting FREE app available on Google Play.

Ready to start the action?

 Match and smash all the balls in this relaxing color-matching adventure. This is one of the best shooter games that are simple
